full_summary:
# [Original US Title and French Equivalence]

## Tender Summary
### [RISO-EC015-241367- Land Based Dredging, Various locations Gulf Region, NB]

_RISO-EC015-241367- Dragages au moyen d'équipement terrestre, divers endroits,  région de golfe N.-B._

### Request for Standing Offer
**Procurement Category:** Bidding for Goods and Services (`CNST`)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (`Demande d’offre à commandes`)
**Notice Type ID:** RISO-EC015-241367

## Tender Document Information
* **Reference Number:** WS4406808638; Sale: Document4406855456
* **Original Tender Release Date:** 2024-01-22
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-02-07; Today’s Tender Release Date 2024-02-09
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-12 14:00:00

## Contract Information
### Locations of Application
Various locations, Gulf Region, New Brunswick (NB)

### Estimated Contract Value
Between $1,001,001 and $5,000,000 (HST included)

### Period of Performance
Between March 01, 2024, and December 31, 2025

## Contracting Authority
### Contracting Entity Name
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 
 **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contract Contact Information
• Name: Sonia (Stockman) (\(SPAC/PSPC\))
• Email: sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Services Required
This Standing Offer for Land Based Dredging (Dragages au moyen d'équipement terrestre) aims at providing an option for undertaking dredging (dragage) in the Gulf Region, New Brunswick (Nouveau-Brunswick) at various public wharves.

## Evaluation Criteria
The candidates will be evaluated based on the **Lowest Price**, for the performance of services under Land Based Dredging.

## Appendices
None were provided with this contract briefing.
Note that you have been allowed a maximum of 400 words. 
Consider only important details related to the Tender-Summary and Contract-Section, and focus on making the rewritten text clear and concise.
